name: 维拉·谭

last_movies.title: 神奇数字马戏团 第一季

introduction: Vera Tan is a Singaporean Australian voice actress who has appeared in numerous games, animation and audio production, such as AFK Arena: Just Esperia Things, Lie of Caelum. and The Tales of Grumville. She is also the director, sprite artist and voice of Mavis in Staccato, an indie visual novel game published by Sunrose Interactive. She started singing at age 4, trained in classical and musical theatre.
